clues.text: Don't click on that hyperlink!  You could become a victim of this O.G. meme, a bait-&-switch prank involving '80s singer Rick Astley
This federal organization has an app where you can "check your refund status" & "sign up for helpful tax tips"
To win at poker, you gotta know when to hold 'em, & know when to dothis, throwing your cards away & forfeiting your shot at the pot
Thisflightless bird isn't just the world's largest, it's also the only bird with just two toes on each foot
Using her first name spelled backwards, Aneres was a fashion label launched in 2004 by a legend in this sport
"Famous potatoes" appears on its standard license plates:DH
One of 2023's meme-iest memes was a photo of this "King of Queens" star mischievously shrugging & smirking
By protecting animals, you earn rankings like "Lieutenant Llama" & "Colonel Chicken" on the app for this org. founded in 1980
In craps, this highest possible number that can be rolled has nicknames like "boxcars" & "midnight"
It's one mammal with a single toe on each foot; also, the only four-legged mammal that regularly wears shoes
In this picture book series, a longtime antagonist is Odlaw; read his name backwards & it makes sense
One of the "Four Corners" states:RZN
A purple milkshake honoring the birthday of this McDonald's mascot sparked a wave of parody horror videos that still haunts us
Hey, senior citizens!Staying sharp is an app that helps with brain health & memory; it was developed by this organization
Have it your way--in blackjack, you can choose whether this card is worth 1 or 11 points
The extra-long fourth toe ofthismarsupial acts as a powerful lever; it's why some can clear more than 30 feet per bound
We see what you did there, Ms. Winfrey; the media mogul gave her production company this name in 1990 by reversing her first name
Where "Roll Tide!" & "War Eagle!" are often shouted:LBM
Barbie sparked a beachload of memes in 2023, including one featuring the unlikely question "Do you guys ever think about" this
Formed in 1979, this government org. has an app that helps you "locate emergency shelters" & "prepare for common hazards"
See lots of pink neon & live pink birds at this Vegas casino that's been standing since 1946 (& not just on one leg!)
Thisanimal has eight total toes & walks on its nails; impressive, since it can beef up to 1,400 pounds
Filled with healthy vitamins, a half-cup of asparagus also contains a gram of this substance spelled backwards in "asparagus"
In 1973 it became the first state to decriminalize marijuana possession:RGN
This dress-wearing android had us all recreating her trademark hallway dance in 2023--minus the part with all the murdering
Stopped by a traffic cop?  At a protest?  Know your rights!  This organization founded in 1920 has an app called Mobile Justice
In may 2024 more than $210 million was wagered on this race won by a 3-year-old named Mystik Dan
Thisreptile has tiny hairs all over its toes for climbing; in commercials, it also has a cockney accent
It's the insurance giant famously bailed out in 2008 whose stock ticker symbol appears backwards in "Giant"
The only state that touches the Arctic Ocean:LSK
